news.content: I will present our project targettrack at [COSYNE 2023](https://www.cosyne.org/past-conferences).
I will present our project targettrack at [APS March Meeting 2023](https://www.aps.org/meetings/meeting.cfm?name=MAR23).
American Physical Society March Meeting 2023: 'Automated neuron tracking using deep learning and targeted augmentation'.
